issue.title: Globals files without units or expansion entry in h5 file raise exceptions

content.raw: My concern mainly revolves around the fact that we do have some ancient hdf5 files with no expansions group in (because they predate the expansion column). Does runmanager raise similar exceptions if you were to open one of those or does the problem only apply to units? maybe it doesn't matter because those files are unlikely to ever be used (and I guess they wouldn't even have the expansion group so a slightly different problem)
content.html: My concern mainly revolves around the fact that we do have some ancient hdf5 files with no expansions group in (because they predate the expansion column). Does runmanager raise similar exceptions if you were to open one of those or does the problem only apply to units? maybe it doesn't matter because those files are unlikely to ever be used (and I guess they wouldn't even have the expansion group so a slightly different problem)
